title: I want to go to school

description: An impression of a day at an average primary school. The main theme is the relationship which develops between child and teacher during early education. Sequences of classroom and individual instruction, improvised play acting, indoor and outdoor recreation, illustrate the well balanced curriculum provided. Intended to help parents towards an understanding of their children's school activities.
